pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph-Based Permutation Tests for Microbiome Data // Provides functions for graph-based multiple-sample testing and visualization of microbiome data, in particular data stored in 'phyloseq' objects. The tests are based on those described in Friedman and Rafsky (1979) http://www.jstor.org/stable/2958919, and the tests are described in more detail in Callahan et al. (2016) doi:10.12688/f1000research.8986.1.
